column4: i kind of finally understand that you have to use the sudo command, but if i want to install mplayer, i had to get a guide from internet with commands like these "sudo apt-get install libgtk1.2-dev" how can i ever make them up myself?
if i try something like sudo apt-get mplayer if says : not available
well if you're compiling from source and it says you dont have GTK1.2 then you install it
